mapper.select:
select T1."orderCode", T1."addTime" "addTime", T1."goodsNum", T1."goodsAttr", T1."goodsName", T1."goodsPrice", T1."goodsAmount", T1."sku", T2."logTime" "logTime", T1."materialCode" "materialCode", T1."osn" "osn", T1."orderSource" "orderSource", T1."payName" "payName", T1."boundsId" "boundsId", T1."orderStatus" "orderStatus" from (select T0.*, case when IOI.BONUS is null then 0 when T0."goodsAmount" is null and IOI.BONUS is not null then IOI.BONUS else ROUND((T0."goodsAmount" / IOI.GOODS_AMOUNT) * IOI.BONUS, 2) end "bonus", IOI.PAY_NAME "payName", IOS.WMS_SOURCE_NAME "orderSource", IWSO.OUTER_ORDER_CODE "outerOrderCode", case when IOI.ORDER_STATUS = 'recede' then '退货' when IOI.ORDER_STATUS = 'processed' then '已确认' else IOI.ORDER_STATUS end "orderStatus", IWSK.SKU_CODE "code", IWSK.MATERIAL_CODE "materialCode", IOI.OSN "osn", IOI.BOUNDSID "boundsId" from (select IRI.ORDER_SN "orderCode", IRI.ADD_TIME "addTime", IRIT.GOODS_NUM "goodsNum", IRIT.GOODS_ATTR "goodsAttr", IRIT.GOODS_NAME "goodsName", IRIT.GOODS_PRICE "goodsPrice", IRIT.GOODS_NUM * IRIT.GOODS_PRICE "goodsAmount", IRIT.SKU "sku" from IUNI_RETURNGOODS_INFO IRI left join IUNI_RETURNGOODS_ITEM IRIT on IRIT.DELIVERY_SN = IRI.DELIVERY_SN where IRI.STATUS <> 'cancelled' union all select IBO.ORDER_SN "orderCode", MILLISEC_TO_DATE2(IBO.ADD_TIME) "addTime", IBOG.GOODS_NUMBER "goodsNum", IBOG.GOODS_ATTR "goodsAttr", IBOG.GOODS_NAME "goodsName", IBOG.GOODS_PRICE "goodsPrice", IBOG.GOODS_NUMBER * IBOG.GOODS_PRICE "goodsAmount", IBOG.SKU "sku" from IUNI_BACK_ORDER IBO left join IUNI_BACK_ORDER_GOODS IBOG on IBOG.DELIVERY_SN = IBO.DELIVERY_SN where IBO.STATUS <> 'cancelled') T0 left join IUNI_ORDER_INFO IOI on IOI.ORDER_SN = T0."orderCode" left join SYN_WMS_SALES_ORDER IWSO on IWSO.ORDER_CODE = T0."orderCode" left join SYN_WMS_SKU IWSK on IWSK.SKU_CODE = T0."sku" left join (SELECT DISTINCT (WMS_SOURCE_CODE), WMS_SOURCE_NAME FROM IUNI_ORDER_SOURCE) IOS ON IOS.WMS_SOURCE_CODE = IWSO.ORDER_SOURCE) T1 left join (select IRL.ORDER_SN "orderCode", IRL.OP_TIME "logTime" from IUNI_RETURNGOODS_LOG IRL where IRL.RETURN_STATUS = 'completed' union all select IOA.ORDER_ID "orderCode", IOA.LOG_TIME "logTime" from IUNI_ORDER_ACTION IOA where IOA.ORDER_STATUS = 'recede' and IOA.SHIPPING_STATUS = 'receipted' and IOA.PAY_STATUS = 'refunded') T2 on T2."orderCode" = T1."orderCode"
AND T1."addTime" >= to_date(#{startDateStr},'yyyy/mm/dd')
AND T1."addTime" < to_date(#{endDateStr},'yyyy/mm/dd')+1
